item.title: Version 1.1
item.description:
Bug fixes

  • Updated to Oculus Runtime 1.13.0
  • Updated to OpenVR 1.0.6
  • Updated to Qt 5.8
  • Tracking poses can now be predicted multiple frames ahead for games that request it
  • The entire touchpad can now be used to initiate thumbstick movement
  • Hybrid grip is now the default grip type, this can be changed using OpenVR-AdvancedSettings
  • Fixed height being incorrectly calibrated in Robo Recall (#561)
